DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to better understand symptoms and quality of life in patients with heart disease and implantable defibrillators (ICDs).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Symptoms and Quality of Life in Patients With Implantable Cardiac Defibrillators (ICDs) and Their Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Patients: Patient has an ICD Age > 18 Fluent in English Consistent and reliable access to a phone. Caregivers of Patients: Age > 18 Fluent in English Consistent and reliable access to a phone Not having an ICD
